sections.heading: Investment of monies in the bond proceeds account5-1471
sections.text: Investment of monies in the bond proceeds accountA. The board may authorize the authority's fiscal agent to invest monies in the bond proceeds account in the manner prescribed by section 5-1473.B. The order directing an investment shall state a
